category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 28 (Senior Sports Committee)
contents: Article 28 (Senior Sports Committee) The Senior Sports Committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to the establishment and direction of policies for the promotion of sports for the elderly 2. Matters pertaining to the establishment and promotion of sports promotion plans for the elderly 3. Matters pertaining to surveys and research on sports for the elderly, development and distribution of sports programs, etc. 4. Other matters pertaining to the elderly Matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Sports Committee and submitted by the Chairman [This Article Newly Inserted on July 5, 2023]
